DOC.brief_summary: This study do create registry help u learn germ cell tumor ( GCT ) testicular tumor . The registry include people tumor also relatives unrelated people without tumor . This study help u learn prevention , diagnosis , treatment outcome tumor . Studying relatives patient people unrelated patient GCT testicular tumor help u understand people get tumor people n't .
DOC.brief_title: Germ Cell Tumor Testicular Tumor DNA Registry
DOC.criteria: Case Cohort Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must diagnosis suspicion germ cell tumor and/or testicular mass Family Member Cohort Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must blood relative proband . Family member probands eligible . These individual need diagnosis GCTTT , use segregation analysis suspect variant find proband . Control Cohort Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must personal history cancer , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer , AND Must family history germ cell tumor testicular tumor AND Must blood relative control enrol study
